name: yache-berry
effect: Held in battle : When the holder would take super-effective ice-type damage, it consumes this item to halve the amount of damage taken.
short_effect: Held: Consumed when struck by a super-effective Ice-type attack to halve the damage.

flavor_text.black_white: Weakens a supereffective Ice-type attack against the holding Pokémon.
flavor_text.black_2_white_2: Weakens a supereffective Ice-type attack against the holding Pokémon.
